wobani.core

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    It computes the delta time factor and the frame per sec value and other useful values.
    See Also:
    getDeltaTimeFactor(), getFps(), getFrameCount()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float getDeltaTimeFactor()
      Returns the delta time factor.
      static int getFps()
      Returns the frame per sec value.
      static int getFrameCount()
      Returns the number of elapsed frames.
      static double getTime()
      Retruns the elapsed time since the start.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getDeltaTimeFactor

        public static float getDeltaTimeFactor()
        Returns the delta time factor. If you multiply something (like movement or rotation) with this value every frame, it'll be FPS independent.
        Returns:
        delta time factor

      • getFps

        public static int getFps()
        Returns the frame per sec value.
        Returns:
        fps

      • getTime

        public static double getTime()
        Retruns the elapsed time since the start.
        Returns:
        the elapsed time since the start (in seconds)

      • getFrameCount

        public static int getFrameCount()
        Returns the number of elapsed frames.
        Returns:
        the number of elapsed frames
